annotations.description: Today we present a mystery drink to you guys. You'll have to watch until the end to crack the code that reveals the name...or will you? Here's a few hints to...
annotations.title: A Fistfull of Dollars

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Still Strength Cachaca
.75oz (22.5ml) Meadowsweet Syrup
.375oz (11ml) Lime Juice
1 Kiwi
Kiwi Slice Garnish

Shake and double strain. Garnish with kiwi slice

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jzk4Lb3PBUs
title: Fist Full of Dollars
